summary: Yusuf is released from prison after serving a ten-year sentence. He is scared of life outside as he goes to an address given to him by another prisoner.
cast: Güven Kiraç|Haluk Bilginer|Derya Alabora|Yalcin Cakmak|Iskender Altin|Dogan Turan|Melis Tuna|Ajlan Aktug|Nihal G. Koldas|Feridun Koç|Nazim Gök|Salih Urfa|Erdogan Seren|Süha Tuna|Apo Demirkubuz|Namik Eken|Eray Kantarci|Riza Sönmez|Ümit Çirak|Engin Kurtcuoglu|Dursun Derebasi
title: Masumiyet
